root: ^<color=red>"THIS. CAN. NOT. BE!"</color> the demon bellows as its form starts to disintegrate, its cries of anguish fading until only a few black ashes remain.
^As you catch your breath, you realize the gravity of your actions. However fleeting this victory may be, it is a victory nonetheless - quenching a thirst that had been over a century in the making.

regularending: ^It seems, at least for now, that the darkness has surrendered its grasp on human lands once more, and the Shattered Realms survive another night.
^You turn your attention to the Hellgate, and it seems to sense your presence in return.
^With a loud, ominous howl, the portal grows. The twisting light intensifies with every step as the black center of the portal starts to reveal the hellscape beyond...
stepaway: ^[Are you sure you want to end the run here? Doing so will end the run in a Victory but will forgo potential rewards beyond the Hellgate.]
stepthrough: ^You turn your attention to the Hellgate, and it seems to sense your presence in return. With a loud, ominous howl the portal grows, the twisting light intensifies with every step as the black center of the portal starts to reveal the hellscape beyond...
